Compliance description: Check if the code masks or anonymizes sensitive data while preserving analytical utility.
Ensure the code implements authentication, authorization, and encryption for model security.
Assess whether the code includes techniques to detect and mitigate model biases against specific groups.
Verify if the code uses SHAP, LIME, or feature importance scores to explain model predictions.
Verify if the code includes strategies for handling failures, security threats, or biases.
Check if the code includes mechanisms to track shifts in input data distribution.
Check if the code includes mechanisms to detect and flag unexpected predictions.
